90 Politics Recoded 🗳️

Nov 26, 2024

  • civictech
  • episode
  • code for america
  • politics
  • volunteering
  • government

  • academia

We’re joined by Aure Schrock, academic editor and writing coach at their company Indelible Voice and author of the book Politics Recoded. We’ll talk about the book and their insights on Code for America, a technology forward non-profit in the civic technology space.
